description: This file defines the AccessDenied error class and functions related to access control, specifically to ensure a user has certain roles.

classes.name: AccessDenied
classes.description: Custom error class used for signaling access denial.

methods.name: ensureRole(roles, user)
methods.description: Checks if the user has at least one of the specified roles, throws AccessDenied if not.

ctags.name: AccessDenied
ctags.pattern: /^class AccessDenied extends Error { constructor(msg = 'Access denied') { super(msg); this.name = /

ctags.name: constructor
ctags.pattern: /^class AccessDenied extends Error { constructor(msg = 'Access denied') { super(msg); this.name = /
